long_description: Need a lift? This heavy duty Thule(R) Step-Up(TM) portable step provides the extra height needed to load gear onto virtually any tall vehicle. Attaches to tire; attachment strap fits easily on front or rear tire, regardless of wheel-well clearance. Heavy-duty construction and no-slip platform ensure stable and sure-footed loading. Step folds flat and fits in convenient carrying bag (included) for easy storage when not in use.
short_description: Need a lift? This heavy duty Thule(R) Step-Up(TM) portable step provides the extra height needed to load gear onto virtually any tall vehicle.
